page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: {LANDSCAPE}The Fletchers Bridge and Cardinham area is situated between Bodmin and Bodmin Moor and is a region of outstanding landscape value. {FARMING}The land is half farmland, moorland,rough grazings and good farmland and half mainly coniferous forest. {HOUSING}Houses are mainly typical Cornish stone and slate construction and are scattered throughout the farmland. {EMPLOYMENT}The people living here are employed in farming and related work. {TOURISM}There is a camping and caravan site close to Bodmin. {TRANSPORT}The A30 and the Bodmin_by_ pass are part of the major transport route through Cornwall. {INDUSTRY}There is a small industrial estate in the process of construction close to Bodmin.
